keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight Education & Health Cuts. Make Sports Free
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to fighting cuts in education and health and making sports accessible for free.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Lower Fuel Bills & provide Green Jobs
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Aims to lower fuel bills and provide jobs within the green energy sector.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Regain local democracy and give residents their say in issues
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on regaining local democracy and empowering residents to have their say on local issues.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Revive Roman Road & Bethnal Green Markets
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Plans to revive the Roman Road and Bethnal Green markets.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improve air quality and green spaces
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Targets the improvement of air quality and the enhancement of green spaces.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Demand more local Olympic jobs and investment
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Seeks more local jobs and investment from the Olympic legacy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More local control over community safety & policing
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Advocates for more local control and say in matters of community safety and policing.

issues.environment: Improve air quality and green spaces.
issues.governance: Regain local democracy and give residents their say in issues.
